verbs.description: Singer John Legend [V: has] slammed House Speaker Paul Ryan with an F - bomb on Twitter over a Trump administration immigration policy that has separated at least 2,000 children from their parents .

[ARG0: Singer John Legend] has [V: slammed] [ARG1: House Speaker Paul Ryan] [ARGM-MNR: with an F - bomb] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] [ARG2: over a Trump administration immigration policy that has separated at least 2,000 children from their parents] .
Singer John Legend has slammed House Speaker Paul Ryan with an F - bomb on Twitter over a Trump administration immigration policy that [V: has] separated at least 2,000 children from their parents .

Singer John Legend has slammed House Speaker Paul Ryan with an F - bomb on Twitter over [ARG0: a Trump administration immigration policy] [R-ARG0: that] has [V: separated] [ARG1: at least 2,000 children] [ARG2: from their parents] .
